text: @RepMaxineWaters Your corruption and Obama’s along with Biden is not unnoticed! Tell the thugs that are rioting to watch the coronavirus? What a scam! You can’t open your businesses but you can let the looters burn it down, you can’t protest the lockdown but you can riot. 🤡
